Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Okay, let's see. I need to look at this event log and figure out which activities are repeated in the same case and then rename them based on their context. Alright, first, I'll go through each case and note the activities that appear more than once. Looking at C001: Activities are Initiate Request, Verify Documents, Call Customer, Submit Additional, Verify Documents again, Approve Request. So Verify Documents appears twice here.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Then in C002: Verify Documents, Call Customer, Adjust Account, Call Customer again, Approve Request. The Call Customer happens twice. C003: Verify Documents, Call Customer, Adjust Account, Verify Documents again, Approve Request. Again, Verify Documents is done twice. So the recurring activities are Verify Documents and Call Customer.

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Wait, in C002, the second Verify Documents isnt there. Wait, looking back: C002s activities: Initiate Request, Verify Documents, Call Customer, Adjust Account, Call Customer, Approve Request. So Verify Documents only once. Wait, no, the user said that the same activity names appear multiple times within a single case. Wait, in C003, there are two Verify Documents.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: So the plan is: For Verify Documents, rename the first occurrence as Initial Document Verification and the second as Re-Verification of Documents or something similar. For Call Customer, first is Initial Customer Call and the second is Follow-Up Customer Call.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: In C001: First Verify Documents: Agent checks identity documents. So initial verification. Second Verify Documents: Agent re-checks documents now that ID scan is provided. So re-verification. In C003: First Verify Documents: Physical verification of ID. Second Verify Documents: Re-verify docs after account adjustment.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: So for C002: First Call Customer: Clarify Account Discrepancy Call or Initial Clarification Call. Second Call Customer: Confirm Adjustments Made Call or Follow-Up Confirmation Call. In C001, the Call Customer is Verification incomplete, agent calls to request missing docs. So maybe Request Missing Documents Call.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Also, the Submit Additional in C001 is unique, but maybe Submit Additional Documents is better. The Adjust Account in C002 and C003 could be named as Adjust Account Details or Internal Account Adjustment for clarity. But the task is to rename the activities that appear multiple times within the same case.
